title: Davi Moreira
text:
Welcome! I am a Visiting Assistant Professor at the Quantitative Theory and Methods Department at Emory University. Previously, I was a Visiting Assistant Professor at the School of Global Policy and Strategy at UCSD, an Assistant Professor in the Political Science Department at the Federal University of Pernambuco (UFPE), Brazil, and the Principal Investigator of the Computational and Experimental Political Science Lab (@cpcex_lab). In 2017, I was awarded the Best Brazilian Ph.D.Â Thesis Prize in Political Science and International Relations.
My academic work addresses Political Methodology, Data Science, Text as Data, Artificial Intelligence, and Comparative Politics.
